code: import React from"react";var EmptyListInfo=function EmptyListInfo(props){var renderNotOpen=function renderNotOpen(){if(props.empty===true){return React.createElement("div",{className:"playlist-text-info"},React.createElement("span",null,"No playlist is currently open, use explorer to open or create a new playlist."));}return null;};return renderNotOpen();};export default EmptyListInfo;
